sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' export default function Signup() { const [name, setName] = useState(); const [mob, setMob] = useState(); const [dept, setDept] = useState(); const [email, setEmail] = useState(); const [pass, setPass] = useState(); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() axios.post(`${window.location.origin}/api/registration`, { name, mob, dept, email, pass }) //registration is database name .then(result => { console.log(result) alert("Registered Successfully") }) .catch(err => console.log(err)) setName('') setMob('') setDept('') setEmail('') setPass('') } return ( <>

Faculty Registration

setName(e.target.value)} required />
setMob(e.target.value)} required />
setDept(e.target.value)} required />
setEmail(e.target.value)} required />
setPass(e.target.value)} required />
